-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | JCDecaux self-service bicycles API client
--   
--   The JCDecaux self-service bicycles API provides access to real-time
--   informations on the stations &amp; contracts of the service.
@package jcdecaux-vls
@version 0.1.0

module JCDecaux.Vls.Types
data Position
Position :: Double -> Double -> Position
positionLatitude :: Position -> Double
positionLongitude :: Position -> Double
data StationStatus
Open :: StationStatus
Closed :: StationStatus
data Station
Station :: Int -> Text -> Text -> Position -> Bool -> Bool -> StationStatus -> Int -> Int -> Int -> Integer -> Station
stationNumber :: Station -> Int
stationName :: Station -> Text
stationAddress :: Station -> Text
stationPosition :: Station -> Position
stationBanking :: Station -> Bool
stationBonus :: Station -> Bool
stationStatus :: Station -> StationStatus
stationBikeStands :: Station -> Int
stationAvailableBikeStands :: Station -> Int
stationAvailableBikes :: Station -> Int
stationLastUpdate :: Station -> Integer
data Contract
Contract :: Text -> Text -> [City] -> Text -> Contract
contractName :: Contract -> Text
contractCommercialName :: Contract -> Text
contractCities :: Contract -> [City]
contractCountryCode :: Contract -> Text
instance Show Position
instance Eq Position
instance Show Contract
instance Eq Contract
instance Show StationStatus
instance Eq StationStatus
instance Show Station
instance Eq Station
instance ToJSON Station
instance FromJSON Station
instance ToJSON StationStatus
instance FromJSON StationStatus
instance ToJSON Contract
instance FromJSON Contract
instance ToJSON Position
instance FromJSON Position

module JCDecaux.Vls.Api
contracts :: MonadIO m => ApiKey -> m (Result [Contract])
stations :: MonadIO m => ApiKey -> m (Result [Station])
contractStations :: MonadIO m => ApiKey -> Text -> m (Result [Station])
contractStation :: MonadIO m => ApiKey -> Text -> Int -> m (Result Station)
newtype ApiKey
ApiKey :: Text -> ApiKey
instance Show Error
instance IsString ApiKey

module JCDecaux.Vls
